recommendations: Eric Bensley
Senior Director, Product Marketing at Salesforce
March 4, 2016, Eric managed Danny directly

I first hired Danny for the Cross-Product Marketing MBA Intern because he was a strong communicator and thought strategically about technology. He stood out among other MBA candidates with very compelling and clear ideas.During Danny's time at Salesforce, his most significant work was a world-class customer experience at Dreamforce. Danny worked with a high profile Salesforce customer (Barclays) to tell a compelling story about how the mortgage industry is under a major shift and the way that Barclays is using Salesforce to lead the charge. This required messaging/positioning, technology demos, sales training, and much more. And to ensure success, Danny got alignment from executives within Salesforce and at Barclays.Danny is a strong marketer who is able to hone messaging and tactics to the target audience. He works hard but never takes himself too seriously (and I mean that in a good way). He has a strong future in Product Marketing and am anxious to see what he will create!

Mobile Product + Strategy
July 15, 2014, Danny worked with Bryan in the same group

Having worked side-by-side with Danny at Mindspace for nearly 3 years I can attest to the fact that he is an ideal hire for any company. His work ethic and character are impeccable, and his ability to solve problems under pressure was one of the keys to our success at Mindspace. He was a valuable asset on the many high stakes projects we produced together, and I would strongly recommend him to anyone looking for a top notch leader and strategist.Danny has all the desired qualities of a future startup CEO, but his integrity, reliability, and empathy are what I remember defining him the most. I fully expect to hear about his hot new tech startup receiving Series A funding 2-3 years from now.

Tristan Zimmerman
Director of Marketing Technology at Local Motors, Inc.
October 16, 2013, Danny worked with Tristan in the same group

Danny is as personable and charming as he is precise and organized. His sense of structure brings a clarity to his strategy that roots out problems before they exist, and he has no problem explaining even complex systems to clients. Personally, as a developer, there isn't a lot that is more important than a clear plan with which to base my code, and being able to discuss that plan with a friendly person is that much better. If you need someone for strategy or client relations (or even a mix of both) Danny is exactly the person you should be working with.

December 7, 2012, Derek was a client of Danny’s

In my years of dealing with hundreds of agencies, I have never met someone who is more equipped and successful at his position than Danny. His ability to manage the entire creative process in less-than-optimal situations while also being a lead copywriter on the project was fantastic in both the execution and how easy he made it look. I've come to rely on his organizational skills and advice. Any organization would be lucky to have this gentleman on their staff, although I'm positive you would have a fight with Mindspace on your hands. I have actually suggested to his bosses that they develop cloning technology so that we can have a Danny of our own.
